one thing i've wondered about a little in glad, why can't the Fire elemental 
just walk up to a tree and destroy it, i mean, come on. its fire, the tree 
is wood. burn it down, actually, that could do some interesting things. like 
your mage makes a small forest, and a fire elemental walks into it, and sets 
the whole thing on fire. it could release smoke clouds that gradually drain 
HP from anybody and everybody.
plus giving the Fire elemental a HP recharge, from absorbing the fire.
